Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small MoufangLoop Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small MoufangLoop AllSmallMoufangLoop is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic moufangloop models from orders 2 to 11.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of MoufangLoop formulas(MoufangLoop).
x*(x+y)=y.
(y^x)*x=y.
x+(x*y)=y.
(y*x)^x=y.
x*(y*(x*z))=((x*y)*x)*z.
z*(x*(y*x))=((z*x)*y)*x.
(x*y)*(z*x)=(x*(y*z))*x.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
